description: This file contains a Jetpack Compose-based implementation of a login screen for an Android application, defining UI layout, styling, user interaction handling, and state management.

classes.name: LoginState
classes.description: Represents the current state of the login form, including email, password, loading status, success, and error message.

classes.name: LoginIntent
classes.description: Sealed class or enum capturing user actions, such as changing email/password and submitting the login form.

classes.name: LoginViewModel
classes.description: ViewModel that manages the login state and exposes observe/removeObserver methods for integrating with Compose.

methods.name: LoginScreen
methods.description: Composable function rendering the login UI, driven by LoginState and emitting user actions as LoginIntent.

methods.name: rememberLoginState
methods.description: Composable helper function that observes LoginViewModel and converts its state into Compose-friendly state.
